basicInfo.name: Sylvia
basicInfo.flavor: Sylvia discovered powerful sorcery by controlling the wandering spirits. She received the nickname of Necromancer due to the nature of her abilities.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Unleash Souls
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 150% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 180% of Magic Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Skill 2.name: Debilitating Curse
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Glittering Souls
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Attack Boost to 31%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Turns: Immortality duration becomes 3 turn(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.dislikes: Loneliness, being ostracized, being alone, fruits
profile.story: Sylvia discovered powerful sorcery by controlling the wandering spirits. She received the nickname of Necromancer due to the nature of her abilities.

basicInfo.name: Sylvia
basicInfo.flavor: During her travels through Dark Grave, Sylvia found and absorbed a spirit of great Darkness.

3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 140% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 140% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Debilitating Curse

All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 85% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Glittering Souls
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Sylvia
basicInfo.flavor: Sylvia is a mysterious girl who has been able to see spirits since she was a child, and she has figured out how to control them. She is known as the Spellweaver by those around her.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Unleash Souls
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 125% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 125% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Debilitating Curse
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 75% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Glittering Souls
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
